perturbation.original_text: "Business Day" means any day that is not a Saturday, a Sunday or other day on which banks are required or authorized by Law to be closed in Beijing.
perturbation.changed_text: "Business Day" means any day that is not a Saturday or a Sunday.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to 'other day on which banks are required or authorized by Law to be closed in Beijing,' the definition becomes incomplete. Other clauses may rely on the original definition, thus creating ambiguity if there is a public holiday and this new definition is taken into consideration.

perturbation.original_text: Notwithstanding the foregoing or anything in Section 8.2 to the contrary, in the event Licensor fails to notify Licensee of Licensor's receipt of such notice from a Governmental Authority, such that Licensee does not have sufficient time to remove such offending Content, Licensee shall not be liable for any fines or penalties imposed by a Governmental Authority in connection with such offending Content.
perturbation.changed_text: Notwithstanding the foregoing or anything in Section 8.2 to the contrary, in the event Licensor fails to notify Licensee of Licensor's receipt of such notice from a Governmental Authority, such that Licensee does not have sufficient time to remove such offending Content, Licensee may be liable for fines or penalties imposed by a Governmental Authority in connection with such offending Content.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the 'shall not' creates a contradiction because it makes the statement unclear and up to interpretation of when the fines will be imposed, contradicting the original intent and creating uncertainty and contradicting any clause that mentions liability.
perturbation.location: 3.3. Website Monitoring and Censoring. (b) New Restrictions Imposed by Governmental Authority.

perturbation.original_text: Licensee shall ensure that the Business complies with all applicable Laws in respect of operation, advertising and promotion of the Business and use of the Licensed Domain Names and Licensed Content in connection therewith.
perturbation.changed_text: Licensee shall ensure that the Business complies with most Laws in respect of operation, advertising and promotion of the Business and use of the Licensed Domain Names and Licensed Content in connection therewith.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'all' to 'most' creates an ambiguity. The original clause intended for full legal compliance, thus this omission introduces a contradiction because the degree of laws to follow is altered.
